name: Demonite
description:
Inspired by ness-like stuff, I made my first game on the godot engine! You play as a little demon named after the purple glowing Terraria ore, who's been tasked to hold the hordes of heaven all by himself!

Burn those annoying shining beings with your powerful fireballs that you can shoot with the "Space Bar"! Avoid all those lightning bolts by moving with the "a" and "d" keys; and jump with "w" so you don't die to the angels that have landed!

"But wait!" I hear you say, "what do I do if an angel gets to the ground and start shooting the hell out of me?" Well, worry not! The answer is simple! Just walk up to their possition and shoot them; they will regret landing in the first place!

Instructions: Move sideways with "a" and "d". Jump with "w", shoot with "Space Bar" and pause the game with "p".

OpenGL 3.3 or higher is required.

Instrucciones: Muévete a los lados con "a" y "d". Puedes saltar con "w", disparar con la "barra espaciadora" y pausar el juego con "p".

Se requiere OpenGL 3.3 o superior.
